00001 <?php
00002 require_once(dirname(__FILE__).'/IReader.php');
00003 class FileReader implements IReader
00004 {
00005     private $fp;
00006     
00007   public function FileReader($file)
00008   {
00009     if(!file_exists($file))
00010             throw new Exception("File does not exist: ".$file);
00011         if(!is_file($file))
00012             throw new Exception("Target is not a file.");
00013         if(!is_readable($file))
00014             throw new Exception("File exists, but is not readable.");
00015         
00016         $this->fp = fopen($file, 'rb');
00017   }
00018 
00019   public function Read($count)
00020   {
00021     if($count > 0) {
00022         return fread($this->fp, $count);
00023     }
00024     return '';
00025     }
00026     
00027     public function ReadInt($count)
00028     {
00029         $int = 0;
00030         for($x = 0; $x < $count; $x++)
00031         {
00032             $buffer = (ord(fgetc($this->fp)) << ($x * 8));
00033             if($buffer === false)
00034                 throw new Exception("Read failure");
00035             $int += $buffer;
00036         }
00037         return $int;
00038     }
00039     
00040     public function GetPosition()
00041     {
00042         return ftell($this->fp);
00043     }
00044     
00045     public function GetSubString($start,$length = FALSE)
00046     {
00047         fseek($this->fp,$start);
00048         if($length === false) {
00049             $data = '';
00050             while($newdata = $this->Read(4096)) {
00051               if(strlen($newdata) == 0) {
00052                 break;
00053               }
00054               $data .= $newdata;
00055             }
00056             return $data;
00057         }
00058         return fread($this->fp,$length);
00059     }
00060     public function ReadCString() {
00061         $string = '';
00062         while(($char = $this->Read(1)) !== false) {
00063             if(ord($char) == 0) {
00064                 break;
00065             }
00066             $string.=$char;
00067         }
00068         return $string;
00069     }
00070     public function Seek($position)
00071     {
00072         fseek($this->fp, $position);
00073     }
00074     
00075     public function Skip($count)
00076     {
00077         fseek($this->fp, $count, SEEK_CUR);
00078     }
00079 }
